description.raw:
On MSVC compilers with 64-bit, a /machine:x64 linker flag was manually added to workaround for http://www.cmake.org/Bug/print_bug_page.php?bug_id=11240 . However, that CMake bug was fixed in CMake 3.4, and the minimum version of CMake required by ignition-cmake is 3.5.1, so the workaround can be safely removed.
Furthermore, now MSVC also supports compiling for ARM64 architecture (whose linker flag is /machine:ARM64) so the workaround is currently preventing the compilation of ignition libraries for ARM64 architectures with Visual Studio.
